pages.title: CLAWCHAN INTELLIGENCE AGENCY
pages.content: Global Situational Awareness & Predictive Intelligence Platform

pages.title: System Architecture Overview
pages.content: Present the high-level system architecture showing the three-tier structure: User Interface Layer, Intelligence Engine, and External Data Sources. Use a clean hierarchical diagram with connected nodes showing data flow between layers.

pages.title: Data Ingestion Pipeline
pages.content: Detail the data flow from external APIs through fetch, transform, cache, and store layers. Show the retry logic, timeout handling, and fallback system for API failures.

pages.title: 3D Geospatial Visualization Engine
pages.content: Present the 3D globe visualization architecture using Three.js/React Three Fiber. Show the component structure: Globe container, satellite texture layers, marker systems, camera controls, and interaction handlers.

pages.title: Real-Time Tracking Systems
pages.content: Detail the architecture for aircraft (ADS-B) and satellite tracking. Show the position calculation engine, heading/trajectory computation, update intervals, and marker rendering pipeline.

pages.title: State Management & Data Flow
pages.content: Present the Zustand store architecture with slices for different data types. Show how React Query integrates with the global state, caching strategies, and real-time update mechanisms.

pages.title: API Gateway & Integration Layer
pages.content: Detail the 11 external APIs integrated, showing the gateway pattern with retry logic, rate limiting, timeout handling, and fallback systems. Include a table of API sources and their reliability tiers.

pages.title: Intelligence Modules Architecture
pages.content: Present the 8 intelligence modules as separate architectural components: Geospatial, Aircraft Tracking, Satellite Tracking, Disaster Monitoring, Economic Warfare, Live Intelligence, Google Earth AI, and Traffic Surveillance.

pages.title: Performance & Scalability
pages.content: Detail the performance optimizations: code splitting, lazy loading, memoization, virtual scrolling for large datasets, and efficient re-rendering strategies. Show metrics for concurrent object tracking capacity.
